'''Swirling Steps''' is a [[Special Dish|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Padisarah Pudding]] with [[Nilou]]. The [[recipe]] for Padisarah Pudding is obtainable from [[Puspa Café]] for 5,000 [[Mora]].
